ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
I CALL TO witness the Fig and the Olive,

ayas.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
ayas.translation: That We created man of finest possibilities,
Then brought him down to the lowest of the low,

ayas.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
ayas.translation: Except those who believe and do the right, for whom there is reward undiminished.
ayas.transliteration: illal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti falahum ajrun ghayru mamnūn

ayas.translation: Who should then make you deny the Judgement after this?
Is not God the most equitable of all judges?
